name: Secret Agent on Battle Beach
description:
Secret Agent on Boom Battle Beach

Free to Play & Download on GOOGLE Play Store.

Welcome to the world of mystery and intrigue! You have been recruited from a select few to ensure the security of USA nation by all means necessary!
You can't get any backup of Military Force, Air force, City Cop & Navy for help you.
Even You can't use pistol,sniper,rifle or Rocket launcher. Means you can't show your shooting or hunting skill in this mission. You can use only your fighting skill only.
They are gaining more influence and building their arsenal. It is one kind of strategic game.
But there is one more secret. There are special ampoules hidden around, be sure to collect them all on your journey.
They are more powerful than you imagine!But there is one more secret.
Tap on the location you wish to move.Then press the move button to confirm the movement.
To quickly move to the desired destination simply double tap and you will start moving instantly.

Game features:

=> Easy to start – impossible the quit!
=> Explore different themed Location!
=> Live a life of the secret agent!
=> Multilevel Mission. It is not impossible mission but it very difficult to complete it
